root.achievement_reward: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.subject,B.subject_loc4,B.subject_loc5,A.text,B.text_loc4,B.text_loc5,A.item, C.name_loc4 as itemname_loc4,C.name_loc5 as itemname_loc5,A.sender,D.name_loc4 as sender_loc4,D.name_loc5 as sender_loc5 FROM achievement_reward A LEFT JOIN locales_achievement_reward B ON A.entry=B.entry LEFT JOIN locales_item C ON A.item=C.entry LEFT JOIN locales_creature D ON A.sender=D.entry
root.quest_template: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.title,B.title_loc4,B.title_loc5,A.Details,B.Details_loc4,Details_loc5,A.Objectives,B.Objectives_loc4,Objectives_loc5, A.OfferRewardText,B.OfferRewardText_loc4,B.OfferRewardText_loc5,A.RequestItemsText,B.RequestItemsText_loc4, B.RequestItemsText_loc5, A.EndText,B.EndText_loc4,B.EndText_loc5,A.CompletedText,B.CompletedText_loc4,B.CompletedText_loc5, A.ObjectiveText1,B.ObjectiveText1_loc4,B.ObjectiveText1_loc5,A.ObjectiveText2,B.ObjectiveText2_loc4,ObjectiveText2_loc5, A.ObjectiveText3,B.ObjectiveText3_loc4,B.ObjectiveText3_loc5,A.ObjectiveText4,B.ObjectiveText4_loc4,ObjectiveText4_loc5 FROM quest_template A LEFT JOIN locales_quest B ON A.entry=B.entry
root.gameobject_template: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.name,B.name_loc4, type,displayId,IconName,A.faction as afaction,D.cnname as FactionName,C.ourMask,C.friendlyMask,C.hostileMask,flags,size,mingold,maxgold,ScriptName, questItem1,questItem2,questItem3,questItem4,questItem5,questItem6,A.castBarCaption,B.castBarCaption_loc4, data0,data1,data2,data3,data4,data5,data6,data7,data8,data9,data10,data11,data12,data13,data14,data15,data16,data17,data18,data19,data20,data21,data22,data23, enemyFaction1,enemyFaction2,enemyFaction3,enemyFaction4,friendFaction1,friendFaction2,friendFaction3,friendFaction4 FROM gameobject_template A LEFT JOIN locales_gameobject B ON A.entry=B.entry LEFT JOIN dbc.FactionTemplate C ON A.faction=C.id LEFT JOIN dbc.Faction D ON C.faction=D.id
root.creature_template: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.name,B.name_loc4,A.subname,B.subname_loc4, MinLevel,MaxLevel, FactionAlliance,CreatureType,CreatureTypeFlags,Family,Rank,InhabitType,RacialLeader,NpcFlags,UnitFlags,DynamicFlags,ExtraFlags,UnitClass, DamageSchool,MechanicImmuneMask,MovementType,TrainerType,AIName,RegenerateStats, D.cnname as FactionName,C.ourMask,C.friendlyMask,C.hostileMask,FactionHorde, SpeedWalk,SpeedRun,Expansion,HealthMultiplier, PowerMultiplier,DamageMultiplier,DamageVariance,ArmorMultiplier,MinLevelHealth,MaxLevelHealth,MinLevelMana,MaxLevelMana, MinMeleeDmg,MaxMeleeDmg,MinRangedDmg,MaxRangedDmg,Armor,MeleeAttackPower,RangedAttackPower,MeleeBaseAttackTime, RangedBaseAttackTime,MinLootGold,MaxLootGold,LootId,PickpocketLootId,SkinningLootId,KillCredit1,KillCredit2, QuestItem1,QuestItem2,QuestItem3,QuestItem4,QuestItem5,QuestItem6,ResistanceHoly,ResistanceFire, ResistanceNature,ResistanceFrost,ResistanceShadow,ResistanceArcane,PetSpellDataId,MovementTemplateId, TrainerSpell,TrainerClass,TrainerRace,TrainerTemplateId,VendorTemplateId,EquipmentTemplateId,VehicleTemplateId, GossipMenuId,ScriptName,ModelId1,ModelId2,ModelId3,ModelId4, DifficultyEntry1,DifficultyEntry2,DifficultyEntry3,Scale FROM creature_template A LEFT JOIN locales_creature B ON A.entry=B.entry LEFT JOIN dbc.FactionTemplate C ON A.FactionAlliance=C.id LEFT JOIN dbc.Faction D ON C.faction=D.id
root.item_template: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.name,B.name_loc4, class,subclass,Quality,displayid,Flags,Flags2,InventoryType,AllowableClass,AllowableRace,ammo_type,TotemCategory,BagFamily,ItemLimitCategory,FoodType,ExtraFlags, RequiredLevel,requiredspell,RequiredSkill,RequiredSkillRank,requiredhonorrank,RequiredCityRank,RequiredReputationFaction,RequiredReputationRank,RequiredDisenchantSkill, ItemLevel,maxcount,stackable,ContainerSlots,BuyCount,BuyPrice,SellPrice,RangedModRange, bonding,PageText,LanguageID,PageMaterial,startquest,lockid,Material,sheath,RandomProperty,RandomSuffix,block,itemset,MaxDurability,ArmorDamageModifier, area,Map,Duration,HolidayId,ScriptName,DisenchantID,minMoneyLoot,maxMoneyLoot, StatsCount,stat_type1,stat_value1,stat_type2,stat_value2,stat_type3,stat_value3,stat_type4,stat_value4,stat_type5,stat_value5,stat_type6,stat_value6, stat_type7,stat_value7,stat_type8,stat_value8,stat_type9,stat_value9,stat_type10,stat_value10, ScalingStatDistribution,ScalingStatValue,dmg_min1,dmg_max1,dmg_type1,dmg_min2,dmg_max2,dmg_type2, armor,holy_res,fire_res,nature_res,frost_res,shadow_res,arcane_res,delay,GemProperties, spellid_1,spelltrigger_1,spellcharges_1,spellppmRate_1,spellcooldown_1,spellcategory_1,spellcategorycooldown_1, spellid_2,spelltrigger_2,spellcharges_2,spellppmRate_2,spellcooldown_2,spellcategory_2,spellcategorycooldown_2, spellid_3,spelltrigger_3,spellcharges_3,spellppmRate_3,spellcooldown_3,spellcategory_3,spellcategorycooldown_3, spellid_4,spelltrigger_4,spellcharges_4,spellppmRate_4,spellcooldown_4,spellcategory_4,spellcategorycooldown_4, spellid_5,spelltrigger_5,spellcharges_5,spellppmRate_5,spellcooldown_5,spellcategory_5,spellcategorycooldown_5, socketColor_1,socketContent_1,socketColor_2,socketContent_2,socketColor_3,socketContent_3,socketBonus,A.description,B.description_loc4 FROM item_template A LEFT JOIN locales_item B ON A.entry=B.entry
root.gossip_menu: SELECT P.entry as entrya,P.text_id,P.script_id,P.condition_id,Q.UTYPE,Q.UNAME,UNAME_loc4,UNAME_loc5,C.text0_0,D.text0_0_loc4,D.text0_0_loc5,C.text0_1,D.text0_1_loc4,D.text0_1_loc5, C.text1_0,D.text1_0_loc4,D.text1_0_loc5,C.text1_1,D.text1_1_loc4,D.text1_1_loc5,C.text2_0,D.text2_0_loc4,D.text2_0_loc5,C.text2_1,D.text2_1_loc4,D.text2_1_loc5, C.text3_0,D.text3_0_loc4,D.text3_0_loc5,C.text3_1,D.text3_1_loc4,D.text3_1_loc5,C.text4_0,D.text4_0_loc4,D.text4_0_loc5,C.text4_1,D.text4_1_loc4,D.text4_1_loc5 FROM gossip_menu P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT distinct A.entry,'NPC' as UTYPE,B.name AS UNAME,C.name_loc4 AS UNAME_loc4,C.name_loc4 AS UNAME_loc5 FROM gossip_menu A INNER JOIN creature_template B ON A.entry=B.gossipmenuid INNER JOIN locales_creature C ON B.entry=C.entry UNION SELECT distinct A.entry,'NPC' as UTYPE,D.name AS UNAME,E.name_loc4 AS UNAME_loc4,E.name_loc5 AS UNAME_loc5 FROM gossip_menu A INNER JOIN npc_gossip B on A.text_id=B.textid INNER JOIN creature C ON B.npc_guid=C.guid INNER JOIN creature_template D ON C.id=D.entry INNER JOIN locales_creature E ON D.entry=E.entry UNION SELECT distinct A.entry,'PMENU' as UTYPE,B.option_text AS UNAME,C.option_text_loc4 AS UNAME_loc4,C.option_text_loc5 AS UNAME_loc5 FROM gossip_menu A INNER JOIN gossip_menu_option B on A.entry=B.action_menu_id INNER JOIN locales_gossip_menu_option C ON B.menu_id=C.menu_id AND B.id=C.id UNION SELECT distinct A.entry,'QUESTGIVER' as UTYPE,B.name AS UNAME,C.name_loc4 as UNAME_loc4,C.name_loc5 as UNAME_loc5 FROM gossip_menu A INNER JOIN Gameobject_Template B on A.entry=B.data3 INNER JOIN locales_gameobject C ON B.entry=C.entry WHERE B.type=2 UNION SELECT distinct A.entry,'GOOBER' as UTYPE,B.name AS UNAME,C.name_loc4 AS UNAME_loc4,C.name_loc5 AS UNAME_loc5 FROM gossip_menu A INNER JOIN Gameobject_Template B on A.entry=B.data19 LEFT JOIN locales_gameobject C ON B.entry=C.entry WHERE B.type=10 ) Q ON P.entry=Q.entry LEFT JOIN npc_text C ON P.text_id=C.id LEFT JOIN locales_npc_text D ON C.id=D.entry
root.gossip_menu_option: SELECT A.option_text,B.option_text_loc4,B.option_text_loc5,A.box_text,B.box_text_loc4,B.box_text_loc5 FROM gossip_menu_option A LEFT JOIN locales_gossip_menu_option B ON A.menu_id=B.menu_id AND A.id=B.id
root.npc_text: SELECT A.id as entrya,A.text0_0,B.text0_0_loc4,B.text0_0_loc5,A.text1_0,B.text1_0_loc4,B.text1_0_loc5, A.text2_0,B.text2_0_loc4,B.text2_0_loc5,A.text2_1,B.text2_1_loc4,B.text2_1_loc5, A.text3_0,B.text3_0_loc4,B.text3_0_loc5,A.text3_1,B.text3_1_loc4,B.text3_1_loc5, A.text4_0,B.text4_0_loc4,B.text4_0_loc5,A.text4_1,B.text4_1_loc4,B.text4_1_loc5, A.text5_0,B.text5_0_loc4,B.text5_0_loc5,A.text5_1,B.text5_1_loc4,B.text5_1_loc5, A.text6_0,B.text6_0_loc4,B.text6_0_loc5,A.text6_1,B.text6_1_loc4,B.text6_1_loc5, A.text7_0,B.text7_0_loc4,B.text7_0_loc5,A.text7_1,B.text7_1_loc4,B.text7_1_loc5 FROM npc_text A LEFT JOIN locales_npc_text B ON A.id=B.entry
root.page_text: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.Text,B.Text_loc4,B.Text_loc5 FROM page_text A LEFT JOIN locales_page_text B ON A.entry=B.entry
root.script_all: SELECT entry,content_default,content_loc4,content_loc5,comment FROM( SELECT entry,content_default,content_loc4,content_loc5,comment FROM script_texts UNION ALL SELECT entry,content_default,content_loc4,content_loc5,comment FROM db_script_string UNION ALL SELECT entry,content_default,content_loc4,content_loc5,comment FROM creature_ai_texts ) P
root.points_of_interest: SELECT A.entry as entrya,A.icon_name,B.icon_name_loc4,B.icon_name_loc5 FROM points_of_interest A LEFT JOIN locales_points_of_interest B ON A.entry=B.entry
root.all: SELECT entry,QTYPE,name,name_loc4,name_loc5 FROM ( SELECT A.entry,'creature' as QTYPE,A.name,B.name_loc4,B.name_loc5 FROM creature_template A LEFT JOIN locales_creature B ON A.entry=B.entry UNION SELECT A.entry,'item' as QTYPE,A.name,B.name_loc4,B.name_loc5 FROM item_template A LEFT JOIN locales_item B ON A.entry=B.entry UNION SELECT A.entry,'gameobject' as QTYPE,A.name,B.name_loc4,B.name_loc5 FROM gameobject_template A LEFT JOIN locales_gameobject B ON A.entry=B.entry ) P
